title: perma banned wrongly... please unban soon as i just finished studyin, nothin to do this friday night
body: , I named my account after the challenger Qq guys who are called boosters because a major factor when ranking is your teammates morale/attitude, and I know for a fact this tends to be higher when teammates think they have a high ranking smurf/ famous person on their team. Please check the IP's / any physical evidence / any evidence at all and you will find 100% that I am no booster/account sharer/ anything, please forgive me for naming myself after those guys I didn't know it was a really severe offense, please I haven't done anything wrong besides naming myself after them I would've never done so if i knew it was permabannable.

:( why riot why u do this to me

i already posted a ticket lol, i literally have nothing to do in my life besides school/league. after 8 hours spent at school and 4 hours spent commuting there and back I came home to being unjustly permabanned, what else am i to do except contemplate the meaning of life and why im still alive instead of dead
If you're actually considering suicide, you really need to immediately call a suicide prevention hotline or talk to a family member (or friend) that will get you help.

Idk why you thought it'd be funny to make a name that would potentially associate you with a group of people that break the rules. that literally is red flagging yourself for negative attention.

also league isn't the only game out there, try something else in the mean time, perhaps something that can be both skillful and relaxing to take the edge off.

i explained why i made the account name this way, I'm a future Psych MA at SFU believe me when I tell you that in Ranked, your Team's mentality/attitude is very crucial if you're trying to grind elo up until about Diamond 3 is very dependent upon team synergy/mentality/attitude. The power of a name is not to be understimated
which is why it's even more baffling why you would want to start off negatively by chosing a name like that.

>  why im still alive instead of dead

Stop man!!  

It's a game!  Study or go to sleep and think about this tomorrow.   

I may know your situation, but I care!
Just email player support.
Then be patient and wait. We here on the forums can't help you with this kind of issue.
haha -7 for a completely legitimate post by a person who was banned unjustly, what the actual heck is going on on these boards

You're getting a lot of lash-back from board users because, although you claim you've been banned unfairly, we don't have anything to trust you on your word. There's nothing for us to look at to get an informed opinion one way or another.

The players on the board also have no control over who gets a perma-ban for boosting. This is literally something that has to be handled between you and Riot.

And the boards are not for private conversations with Riot, it's for community discussion.
I would just downvote for the suicide threats. It's not cool, will never be cool and it does not help your case.
